Plot: Three women take a road trip to Santa Barbara in order to deliver the ashes of one of their dead husbands to his resentful daughter.
Title: Bonneville
Writer: Daniel D. Davis (screenplay), Daniel D. Davis (story), Christopher N. Rowley (story)
Actors: Jessica Lange, Robert Conder, Kathy Bates, Joan Allen
tomatoConsensus: The amazing cast of Bonneville is paired up with a basic, predictable script and lackluster direction.
